sentence: Speaker, I commend Congresswoman Ramirez  for conducting this Special Order hour, and I thank her for yielding me  time.
Speaker, I thank Representative Ramirez for her  incredible leadership on this issue and so many others.
Representative Houlahan and Representative Ramirez offered an  amendment, Mr.
Speaker, I am grateful for the leadership of  Congresswoman Ramirez, who has led with her own lived experiences and  her compassion.

I applaud my colleague, Representative Delia Ramirez, for offering an  amendment to require specific trainings on these tactics to provide  veterans and their families with clear, actionable guidance to protect  their hard-earned benefits.
On the majority side are Paul Anstine,  Anna Lanier Fischer, Fern Gibbons, Alessandra Ramirez, Ashley Truluck,  and Nkosi Thomas.
I congratulate and thank Coach Thomas; the relay squad, Ricardo  Brooks, Armani Ramirez-Sperle, Vijay Carrier, and Jayden Thomas; and  everyone who played a part in this remarkable season.
